actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish a United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs.
short_title: United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2011

summary.text: United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2011 - Amends the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish within the Department of State an Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs.

titles.title: United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs Act of 2011
A bill to amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to establish a United States Ambassador at Large for Arctic Affairs.
